body_html:
@pjh5
I am a unsure if I installed caffe2 by using

conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7

or by

  1. git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
  2. cd pytorch
  3. python setup_caffe2.py install

I think it was the second method because when conda list caffe2 shows build channel as pip

Name Version Build Channel
caffe2 0.8.2 pip

@pjh5
I am a unsure if I installed caffe2 by using
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
or by

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch
python setup_caffe2.py install

I think it was the second method because when conda list caffe2 shows build channel as pip
Name                    Version                   Build  Channel
caffe2                    0.8.2                     pip
body:
@pjh5 
I am a unsure if I installed caffe2 by using 

**conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7**

or by

1. git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git 
2. cd pytorch
3. python setup_caffe2.py install

I think it was the second method because when conda list caffe2 shows build channel as pip

Name                    Version                   Build  Channel
caffe2                    0.8.2                     pip
